name: Vetro and the Dark Crystal's Trick
name_original: Vetro and the Dark Crystal's Trick
description:
The dolphins use their songs to rule the oceans peacefully, and everyone seems happy. Almost everyone...

The mighty Squid hides in a deep cave, shielding himself from the world. What are these talks of oppression? Freedom against dolphins? Vetro the dolphin dives in, confident that his magical singing will unveil the true reason behind the Squid's ramblings.

An entry for the Narrative Driven Game Jam #2.

--- Gameplay ---

This game is controlled with the mouse.

Advance text by left clicking.

In the singing levels, repeat the note sequence to make Vetro use his singing powers.

--- Credits ---

Vetro and the Dark Crystal's Trick was developed in Unity 2020.1

Story and code from KaaSnake

Pixel Art done in GIMP by KaaSnake

Music composed in Bosca Ceoil by KaaSnake
